SQL_MODE.SQL: SELECT BRANCH_NO,BRANCH_NO||'-'||BRANCH_NAME as BRH_NAME FROM tbl_branch_manager_true order by BRANCH_NO
SELECT AGEN_ID||'-'||AGEN_NAME,AGEN_ID||'-'||AGEN_NAME as AGEN_NAME FROM TBL_AGENCY_INFO_TRUE where statue='1' order by AGEN_ID
select AGEN_ID,AGEN_ID||' - '||AGEN_NAME from TBL_AGENCY_INFO a where a.STATUE='1'
SELECT BRANCH_NO,BRANCH_NO||'-'||BRANCH_NAME as BRH_NAME FROM tbl_branch_manage where state In('0','1','2','7','8') order by BRANCH_NO
SELECT ROLE_ID,ROLE_NAME as BRH_NAME FROM TBL_ROLE_INF order by ROLE_ID
select CITY_CODE||' - '||CITY_DES from TBL_CITY_CODE
select KEY,KEY||' - '||VALUE from CST_SYS_PARAM where OWNER='CHANNEL'
select KEY,KEY||' - '||VALUE from CST_SYS_PARAM where OWNER='TXNTYPE'
SELECT FUNC_ID ,FUNC_NAME FROM TBL_FUNC_INF where FUNC_TYPE = '1' order by FUNC_ID
SELECT MCHNT_TP_GRP,MCHNT_TP_GRP ||' - '||DESCR as DESCR FROM TBL_INF_MCHNT_TP_GRP
SELECT trim(MCHT_NO),trim(MCHT_NM) FROM TBL_MCHT_BASE_INF WHERE trim(MCHT_GROUP_FLAG)='1' ORDER BY MCHT_NO
SELECT CITY_CODE_NEW,CITY_CODE_NEW ||' - '|| CITY_NAME AS CITY_NAME FROM TBL_CITY_CODE
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'MCHNT_ATTR'
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'CERTIFICATE' and KEY in('01','06')
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'CERTIFICATE' and KEY in('01','06','12','13')
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'DIVIDETYPE'
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'MANAGEOWNER'
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'CHANTYPE'
SELECT KEY, KEY ||' - '||VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'RISKAFTER' ORDER BY KEY
select key,value from cst_sys_param where owner = 'TERM_TYPE'
SELECT TERM_ID,TERM_ID FROM TBL_TERM_INF
select TXN_NUM,TXN_NAME from TBL_TXN_NAME order by TXN_NUM
select TXN_NUM,TXN_NAME from TBL_TXN_NAME WHERE TXN_NUM IN ('5031','5221') order by TXN_NUM
select mchnt_tp,mchnt_tp ||' - '||descr from tbl_inf_mchnt_tp
select t1.mchnt_tp ,'(' || t2.descr || ')' || t1.mchnt_tp || ' - ' || t1.descr from tbl_inf_mchnt_tp t1 left join tbl_inf_mchnt_tp_grp t2 on t1.mchnt_tp_grp = t2.mchnt_tp_grp
select TXN_NUM,TXN_NAME from TBL_TXN_NAME where DC_FLAG = '1' order by TXN_NUM
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'MCHT_E_CD' ORDER BY KEY
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'FACTORY' ORDER BY KEY
SELECT FUNC_ID,FUNC_NAME FROM TBL_FUNC_INF WHERE FUNC_TYPE = '0' ORDER BY FUNC_ID
select * from (select distinct trim(INS_ID_CD) as id,trim(INS_ID_CD)||' - '||trim(CARD_DIS) from TBL_BANK_BIN_INF) order by id
select * from (select BIN_STA_NO as id,trim(BIN_STA_NO) from TBL_BANK_BIN_INF) order by id
select distinct PAPER_ID,PAPER_ID as PAPER from TBL_PAPER_HIS_INF
Select key,value from cst_sys_param where OWNER = 'PROP_TP'
Select key,value from cst_sys_param where OWNER = 'CONN_TYPE'
<!-- Select key,value from cst_sys_param where OWNER = 'TERMMACHTP' -->
SELECT KEY, KEY ||' - '||VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'CHANNEL' ORDER BY KEY
SELECT KEY, KEY ||' - '||VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'SERVICECODE' ORDER BY KEY
SELECT KEY, KEY ||' - '||VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'TXNTYPE' ORDER BY KEY
SELECT KEY, KEY ||' - '||VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'COUNTRY' ORDER BY KEY
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'TRANSWAY'
Select trim(KEY),trim(VALUE) from cst_sys_param where OWNER = 'MANAGEOWNER'
SELECT trim(TXN_NUM),TXN_NAME FROM TBL_TXN_NAME WHERE TXN_NUM in ('5221')
select MCHT_NO, MCHT_NO ||' - '|| MCHT_NM as MCHT_NM from TBL_MCHT_BASE_INF where 1=1
select MCHT_NO, MCHT_NM as MCHT_NM from TBL_MCHT_BASE_INF where 1=1
SELECT distinct(trim(INS_ID_CD)),trim(INS_ID_CD)||' - '||trim(CARD_DIS) FROM TBL_BANK_BIN_INF
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'INDEX'
SELECT AGENT_NO,AGENT_NO||'-'||AGENT_NM as AGE_NM FROM tbl_agent_info order by AGENT_NO
SELECT DISC_CD,DISC_CD||'-'||DISC_NM as AGE_NM FROM TBL_INF_DISC_CD where sa_state ='2' order by DISC_CD
